hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Arrows#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Small Key# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #0# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Near Dodongos

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Milk Bottle# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Song of Time#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Ganon's Castle Boss Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Arrows#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that Lon Lon Ranch prospered under Ingo.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Key#.
